data.message: Man!   004738074250 Ask for TRL  --- Mary Magdalene can save me, maybe! But im kinda in a fucktup situasion...Im stuck at mental hospital...they dont want me in jail....i got 100 cases within April...so, my only option for me is for you to call me or something Emin EM..Just too show them strength( im in enough trouble with the goverments now, cant do anymore work there!..I wanna meet you and be with you now ! All the work is done, its just for us too set a court datebeginning or something....your part! man! here in Norway FFS !!! I dont want you Hurted ! Truly your biggest fan - This is STAN...Call me! 004738074250 ask for Tom Robin Løyte <3
